items.title: Awesome It Quotes
items.content_text:
### Quotes - Quote: ‚ÄúA computer would deserve to be called intelligent if it could deceive a human into believing that it was human.‚Äù

‚ÄúMachines take me by surprise with great frequency.‚Äù

‚ÄúWe can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.‚Äù

‚ÄúThose who can imagine anything, can create the impossible.‚Äù

‚ÄúIf a machine is expected to be infallible, it cannot also be intelligent.‚Äù

‚ÄúSometimes it is the people who no one imagined anything of who do the things that no one can imagine‚Äù Author:
[![Alan Turing](https://github.com/victorlaerte/awesome-it-quotes/raw/master/images/alan_turing.jpg)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Turing)
Alan Turing (Computer Scientist, widely considered to be the father of theoretical computer science and artificial intelligence) - Quote: ‚ÄúIt has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.‚Äù

‚ÄúThere are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.‚Äù

‚ÄúIf you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.‚Äù

‚ÄúLogic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.‚Äù

‚ÄúLife is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.‚Äù

‚ÄúAnyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.‚Äù Author:
[![Albert Einstein](https://github.com/victorlaerte/awesome-it-quotes/raw/master/images/albert_einstein.jpg)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_Einstein)
Albert Einstein (Scientist theoretical physicist) - Quote: ‚ÄúFailure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.‚Äù

‚ÄúWhen something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.‚Äù

‚ÄúIf you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day. Otherwise, it‚Äôs not.‚Äù

‚ÄúPersistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.‚Äù

‚ÄúI could either watch it happen or be a part of it.‚Äù Author:
[![Elon Musk](https://github.com/victorlaerte/awesome-it-quotes/raw/master/images/elon_musk.jpg)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elon_Musk)
Elon Musk (Business magnate, investor, engineer, and inventor.)
items.content_html:
Quotes

  • Quote: ‚ÄúA computer would deserve to be called intelligent if it could deceive a human into believing that it was human.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúMachines take me by surprise with great frequency.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúWe can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúThose who can imagine anything, can create the impossible.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúIf a machine is expected to be infallible, it cannot also be intelligent.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúSometimes it is the people who no one imagined anything of who do the things that no one can imagine‚Äù

    Author:


    Alan Turing (Computer Scientist, widely considered to be the father of theoretical computer science and artificial intelligence)

  • Quote: ‚ÄúIt has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúThere are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúIf you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúLogic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúLife is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúAnyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.‚Äù

    Author:


    Albert Einstein (Scientist theoretical physicist)

  • Quote: ‚ÄúFailure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúWhen something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúIf you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day. Otherwise, it‚Äôs not.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúPersistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.‚Äù

    ‚ÄúI could either watch it happen or be a part of it.‚Äù

    Author:


    Elon Musk (Business magnate, investor, engineer, and inventor.)

items.title: Awesome Blazor
items.content_text:
### General

*   [GitHub repository (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore) - ![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/dotnet/aspnetcore?style=flat-square\&cacheSeconds=604800\&logo=microsoft) ![last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/dotnet/aspnetcore?style=flat-square\&cacheSeconds=86400) The official Blazor repository (which is the ASP.NET Core repository).

### Tools & Utilities / Others

items.title: Awesome Django
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / APIs

*   [django-rest-framework (‚≠ê29k)](https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework) - Web APIs for Django.
*   [django-cors-headers (‚≠ê5.5k)](https://github.com/adamchainz/django-cors-headers) - If your back-end and front-end are on different servers, you need this.
*   [djoser (‚≠ê2.7k)](https://github.com/sunscrapers/djoser) - REST implementation of Django auth.
*   [djaq (‚≠ê80)](https://github.com/paul-wolf/djaq) - An instant remote API to Django models with a powerful query language.
*   [drf-yasg (‚≠ê3.5k)](https://github.com/axnsan12/drf-yasg) - Automated generation of real Swagger/OpenAPI 2.0 schemas from Django REST Framework code.
*   [graphene-django (‚≠ê4.4k)](https://github.com/graphql-python/graphene-django) - GraphQL for Django.
items.content_html:
Third-Party Packages / APIs

  • django-rest-framework (‚≠ê29k) - Web APIs for Django.
  • django-cors-headers (‚≠ê5.5k) - If your back-end and front-end are on different servers, you need this.
  • djoser (‚≠ê2.7k) - REST implementation of Django auth.
  • djaq (‚≠ê80) - An instant remote API to Django models with a powerful query language.
  • drf-yasg (‚≠ê3.5k) - Automated generation of real Swagger/OpenAPI 2.0 schemas from Django REST Framework code.
  • graphene-django (‚≠ê4.4k) - GraphQL for Django.
